mapper.select:
select b.id,b.img_file_name,b.title,b.subtitle,b.price ,b.distance,b.number,b.`desc`,b.city,b.category,b.star_total_num,b.comment_total_num ,d_city.name city_name,d_category.name category_name from business b left join dic d_city on b.city=d_city.code and d_city.type='${@cn.lqandzy.constant.DicTypeConst@CITY}' left join dic d_category on b.category=d_category.code and d_category.type='${@cn.lqandzy.constant.DicTypeConst@CATEGORY}'
and b.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and b.subtitle like '%' #{subtitle} '%'
and b.`desc` like '%' #{desc} '%'
and b.city = #{city}
and b.category = #{category}
order by id
mapper.update: update business set img_file_name=#{imgFileName}, title=#{title}, subtitle=#{subtitle}, price=#{price}, distance=#{distance}, number=#{number}, `desc`=#{desc}, city=#{city}, category=#{category}, star_total_num=#{starTotalNum}, comment_total_num=#{commentTotalNum} where id=#{id}
